title: Mobile-Based Nursing Simulation Education: Enhancing Interactivity and Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing theories and basic clinical skills
context.additional_context: An environment enabling real-time interaction and simulation-based learning using smartphones and mobile apps, with learning primarily conducted via mobile devices in settings without PC access.

learning_goals: Learners can perform patient assessment and intervention procedures in nursing simulation scenarios via a mobile platform with 80% accuracy.
Learners enhance their clinical judgment skills by exchanging real-time feedback with peers and instructors using mobile-based collaborative tools.
Learners can present at least three criteria for selecting reliable learning content and apply an information verification process in mobile environments.

resources: Mobile Device for VR Content Access
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
